scripts.watch: npm run watch:client & npm run watch:server
scripts.watch:client: npm run watch:client:style && npm run watch:client:script
scripts.build: npm run copy && npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: npm run build:client:script && npm run build:client:style
scripts.build:client:style: (test -d build/static/ || mkdir -p build/static/) && node_modules/.bin/node-sass src/client/style/main.scss > build/static/style.css
scripts.build:server: npm run build:server:transpile && npm run build:server:copy-static
scripts.build:server:copy-static: (test -d build/ || mkdir build/) && cp --recursive -T src/server/static/ build/static/
scripts.copy: npm run copy:bootstrap && npm run copy:fontawesome
scripts.copy:fontawesome: (test -d src/server/static/fonts/ || mkdir src/server/static/fonts) && cp -T --recursive node_modules/font-awesome/scss/ src/client/style/font-awesome/ && cp -T --recursive node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/ src/server/static/fonts/font-awesome/
